data.subject: JOKE OF THE DAY!!!
data.message: A black man asks his wife to go out and buy him a Halloween costume. An hour later she shows up with a Superman costume. The man hollers "what the is this? Have you ever seen a black Superman? Get your ass out there and get me something else!” Another hour goes by and she shows up with a Batman costume. The man hollers “are you serious? Have you ever seen a black Batman? Get your ass out there and find me something else!” Another hour goes by and the wife shows back up with 3 white dots, I white belt and a 2x4. The man hollers “what the f... am I supposed to be with these?” His wife says “Mother fu...., you can go naked and put the 3 white dots on and go as a domino, or put the white belt on and go as an Oreo, and if you don’t like those ideas you can shove the 2x4 up your ass and go as a fudgesicle
